Sentencas: A 10-cell planar stack with solid oxide cells was tested in reversible operation: fuel cell and electrolysis mode.
Titulo: Performance characterization of a solid oxide cell stack with chromium-based interconnects (CFY)

Sentencas: The stack consists of electrolyte supported cells (ESCs) based on Scandia doped Zirconia (similar to 165 Am thick), Chromium based interconnects (CFY) and H.C. Starck electrodes.
Titulo: Performance characterization of a solid oxide cell stack with chromium-based interconnects (CFY)

Sentencas: Different temperature regimes have been tested and the results of the experiments are presented and discussed.
Titulo: Performance characterization of a solid oxide cell stack with chromium-based interconnects (CFY)

Sentencas: The effects of different operating temperatures at various H-2/H2O-ratios in steam electrolysis mode and various H-2/H2O/CO2-ratios in co electrolysis mode were studied and the operating limits determined.
Titulo: Performance characterization of a solid oxide cell stack with chromium-based interconnects (CFY)

Sentencas: Finally an endurance test in co-electrolysis mode was conducted.
Titulo: Performance characterization of a solid oxide cell stack with chromium-based interconnects (CFY)

Sentencas: Experiments were performed over a temperature range of 750-850 degrees C and current densities between 0 and 0.36 A/cm(2).
Titulo: Performance characterization of a solid oxide cell stack with chromium-based interconnects (CFY)

Sentencas: The results include temperature profiles in fuel cell mode and electrolysis performance at various temperatures, gas inlet compositions and inlet flow rates.
Titulo: Performance characterization of a solid oxide cell stack with chromium-based interconnects (CFY)

Sentencas: In steam electrolysis best performance was achieved with a 20/80-H-2/H2O-ratio, whereby a steam conversion rate of 92% and an electrolysis efficiency of 79% were obtained at the maximum current density of 0.36 A/cm2. Co-electrolysis tests were carried out up to current densities of 0.3 A/cm2 and H-2/CO-ratios of 14.05, 6.43 and 2.82 were measured at the outlet.
Titulo: Performance characterization of a solid oxide cell stack with chromium-based interconnects (CFY)

Sentencas: Using the inlet gas composition of H-2/H2O/CO2 = 20/70/10, which is a typical outlet gas compositions for a small scale distributed hydrogen generation application, a steam conversion of 68% and an average H-2/CO-ratio of 6.34 were achieved.
Titulo: Performance characterization of a solid oxide cell stack with chromium-based interconnects (CFY)
